Actors: Lily James, Amanda Seyfried, Meryl Streep, Dominic Cooper
Writer: Ol Parker (screenplay by), Richard Curtis (story by), Ol Parker (story by), Catherine Johnson (story by), Judy Craymer (originally conceived by), Catherine Johnson (based on the original musical by)
Plot: In this sequel to Mamma Mia!, Sophie learns about her mother's past while pregnant herself.
Title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
